means: 教育的，教育性的，教育上的

sentence.Network_en: the educative role of the community
Any academic studies involve value judgment , so as comparative educative research.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何学术研究都会涉及到价值, 比较教育研究自然也不例外.

sentence.Network_en: There still exist some advantages in their educational system, among which some have educative value.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的教育体制有些优势与长处, 其中部分具有教育意义.

list.abs: 九年级英语单词表 ... tiring 麻烦的 educational 教育的 peaceful 和平的.
...伴（peer）“就是“身份相同的人；属于相同社会群体的人，尤其在年龄、等级或社会地位方面等同“。而“教育(education)“关系到“发展（development）“、“培训(training)“，或者对既定的人或事物的“见.

entry.tran: 有教育意义的;教育性的
entry.def: Something that has an educative role teaches you something.

example.ex: ...the educative value of allowing broadcasters into their courts.
example.tran: 允许电视台进入他们的审判庭所具有的教育意义

auth_sentence.content: Why should something so flawed dictate our educative and research institutions?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why should something so flawed dictate our educative and research institutions?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why should something so flawed dictate our educative and research institutions?

auth_sentence.content: Walton has a similarly educative spirit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Walton has a similarly educative spirit.
